name: beta106i - Corners of the Globe
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.000000
fDecay=0.950000
fVideoEchoZoom=0.999609
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000000
nVideoEchoOrientation=3
nWaveMode=3
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=1
bWaveThick=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=0
bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=100.000000
fWaveScale=0.295693
fWaveSmoothing=0.900000
fWaveParam=-0.500000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.750000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=0.950000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000
fWarpScale=2.853000
fZoomExponent=1.000000
fShader=0.000000
zoom=1.000343
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000000
dy=0.000000
warp=0.000000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.500000
wave_g=0.500000
wave_b=0.500000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.005000
ob_r=0.000000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.005000
ib_r=0.000000
ib_g=0.000000
ib_b=0.000000
ib_a=0.000000
nMotionVectorsX=12.000000
nMotionVectorsY=9.000000
mv_dx=0.000000
mv_dy=0.000000
mv_l=0.900000
mv_r=1.000000
mv_g=1.000000
mv_b=1.000000
mv_a=0.000000
per_frame_1=wave_r = wave_r + 0.602*(0.61*sin(0.933*time) + 0.301*sin(1.045*time));
per_frame_2=wave_g = wave_g + 0.404*(0.605*sin(1.209*time) + 0.37*sin(0.956*time));
per_frame_3=wave_b = wave_b + 0.201*(0.60*sin(0.910*time) + 0.60*sin(0.992*time));
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=//wave_x = wave_x + 0.1*sin(time);
per_frame_6=//wave_y = wave_y + 0.1*cos(time);
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=zoom = zoom + 0.05+0.4*(3*sin(3*time)*(0.5-x));
per_pixel_7=zoom = zoom + 0.05+0.4*(3*cos(3*time)*(0.5-y));
